extendedIngredients.name: chocolate chips
extendedIngredients.originalString: Sweetened shredded coconut and more white chocolate chips, for topping

extendedIngredients.name: granola
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 crunchy granola bars (I used 2 packages of Nature Valley Oats 'n Honey granola bars), broken into smaller pieces
metaInformation: (I used 2 packages of Nature Valley Oats 'n Honey granola bars)

extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey
pineapple tidbits
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cup chopped fresh pineapple or well-drained canned pineapple tidbits

extendedIngredients.name: yogurt
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 (6 oz) container Liberté Méditerranée coconut yogurt

recipes.title: pineapple-macadamia nut parfait + liberte coconut yogurt

winePairing.pairingText: Parfait works really well with Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. The NV Solera Cream Sherry with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Solera Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: The Solera Cream Sherry has a brilliant amber and deep copper hue. With butterscotch and pecan aromas, the sweet salted nut and brown spice aromas carry a complex caramel accent. A sweet entry leads to a rounded, lush, moderately full-bodied palate with a lengthy, flavorful finish.

recipes.instructions: In a food processor, process granola bars and nuts until crumbled.In a small bowl, fold whipped cream and white chocolate chips into yogurt.In a separate small bowl, combine pineapple and honey.Spoon a couple heaping tablespoons of granola mixture into the bottom of 2 parfait glasses. Top with ¼ cup of the yogurt mixture, then ¼ cup of the pineapple mixture. Repeat.Garnish with shredded coconut and more white chocolate chips. Serve immediately.

steps.step: In a food processor, process granola bars and nuts until crumbled.In a small bowl, fold whipped cream and white chocolate chips into yogurt.In a separate small bowl, combine pineapple and honey.Spoon a couple heaping tablespoons of granola mixture into the bottom of 2 parfait glasses. Top with ¼ cup of the yogurt mixture, then ¼ cup of the pineapple mixture. Repeat.
Garnish with shredded coconut and more white chocolate chips.
